thread.title: PowerObjects Brings Home Some Serious Hardware at Microsoft’s 2015 Worldwide Partner Conference
thread.title_full: PowerObjects Brings Home Some Serious Hardware at Microsoft’s 2015 Worldwide Partner Conference

author: Jeff Wedren
title: PowerObjects Brings Home Some Serious Hardware at Microsoft’s 2015 Worldwide Partner Conference
text:
PowerObjects, a professional services firm 100% focused on providing service, support, education and add-ons for Microsoft Dynamics CRM , was thrilled to win multiple awards at Microsoft’s 2015 Worldwide Partner Conference (WPC) held this year in Orlando, FL. The awards include:
2015 Cloud Customer Relationship Management Partner of the Year 2015 US SMB Champions Club North Central Cloud Partner of the Year 2015 US SMB Champions Club Central Region Partner of the Year 2015 Microsoft Dynamics Inner Circle
“What I heard at WPC was that Microsoft looked across the whole ecosystem and said, ‘Which partner is driving the most value out of CRM?’ And this year, they decided that partner was PowerObjects. That’s like winning the Super Bowl for us!” says Jim Sheehan, COO at PowerObjects.
2015 Cloud Customer Relationship Management Partner of the Year award is presented to a partner who has shown both innovation and results related to selling and delivering Microsoft Dynamics CRM cloud offerings.
“This is a phenomenal achievement for us,” says Sheehan. “These awards —particularly the Cloud CRM Partner of the Year award—are a testament to our commitment to providing outstanding service in the Dynamics community.”
The 2015 US SMB Champions Club North Central Cloud Partner of the Year award recognizes the US SMB Champions Club partner who has demonstrated a commitment to Microsoft SMB Cloud business through consistent marketing of cloud services resulting in SMB customer adoptions of the Cloud solution set.
The 2015 US SMB Champions Club Central Region Partner of the Year award recognizes the US SMB Champions Club partner who has demonstrated significant Microsoft SMB sales and year-over-year SMB revenue growth with Region SMB customers.
“When you think about everything that goes into making these awards possible, it’s really about the team, and how we drive value back into Microsoft Dynamics CRM with our four pillars of service, support, education, and add-ons,” says Sheehan. “I think this year we’ve proved once again that we are driving that value back to Microsoft and our customers!”
In addition to the regional awards, PowerObjects also achieved membership in Microsoft’s Inner Circle for 2015. Microsoft Dynamics Inner Circle is an elite group of the most strategic Microsoft Dynamics partners from across the globe with sales achievements that rank them in the highest echelon of the Microsoft Dynamics global network of partners.
About PowerObjects
The team at PowerObjects has worked hard to become the recognized leader in delivering Microsoft Dynamics CRM solutions through unparalleled offerings of service, support, education, and add-ons. As winner of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Worldwide Partner of the Year award for 2012 and 2013, and 2015 CRM Cloud Partner of the Year, PowerObjects has built an unmatched team of CRM superheroes that help businesses and organizations of all types increase productivity, streamline business processes and build better relationships. PowerObjects is headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, with offices in Chicago, Cincinnati, Dallas, Omaha, Philadelphia, New York, San Francisco, Seattle, and Toronto.
